review: The Google Chromecast is easy to use and inexpensive, but these two things do not make up for the lack of available channels that Google is offering at this time. If Chromecast were more expensive I would have returned it due to the lack of channels and features it offers at this time. I'll stick it out for now but hopefully Google will be adding more content and functionality soon.
